title: Mud Hen Tavern
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened Dec 2013 after renovating Susan Feniger's Street, same location and owners. Now it's a neighborhood gastopub that offers a variety of non-veg as well as vegetarian and vegan food. Has vegan cheese for pizza, plus a spicy vegan burger, and a vegan mocha dessert. Prices moderate to slightly more. Menu denotes vegan options.
